'''''Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees''''' is a [[World Quest]] in [[Gavireh Lajavard]], [[Sumeru]]. It is part of the {{Quest|Pale Fire}}.

==Start Location==
<gallery>
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 2) Start Location.png|Start location
World Quest Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 2) Start Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Steps==
# Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the [[Fravashi Tree]]
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
#Bring the [[Udumbara Pistil|Udumbara]] to the residual Pari
# Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The residual Pari residing within the Fravashi Trees are still trapped in obsessions of the past. It seems that Sorush can awaken them...}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first meet|section=1}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the Fravashi Tree)
:'''Paimon:''' It's a Fravashi Tree. We can't just leave it be!

;(Talk to the Pari)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Hey, I don't think we've met before! Are you a Yasnapati?
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' If you could, would you mind bringing me the Udumbara Pistils? It would bloom from where it cannot bloom...

;(Talk to the Pari again)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' If you could, would you mind bringing me the Udumbara Pistils?
:;(Open inventory submission screen)
;(After submitting the Udumbara)
:'''Residual Pari of the Forest:''' Wow, look at these, the Udumbara Pistils! So, this is one of those glorious eras, eh?
{{Dialogue End}}
{{Transclude|Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 1)|first clear|section=1}}
